column2: Television pundit makes comment I agree with and think is well-worded
column5: Appearing as a guest on a regularly-occurring television news program a pundit made a comment that I agreed with and thought was particularly well-worded refuting a point of view that I strongly oppose. Please watch the video. I have nothing more to say about it.  Elsewhere an article by an author on a website recounted an interesting thing. Here are eight of the ten paragraphs from the article.
